name: C.U.P.I.D.
description:
C.U.P.I.D. (An ExtraCredit GameJam Entry)

In a near, alternate future, C.U.P.I.D. (Completely Unharmful Pairing & Inspection Division) is one of the leading companies in the dating service market. For the right price they guarantee their clients the perfect partner for life. Their creed: 'We will connect'.
You are one of C.U.P.I.D.s agents and you found your perfect preying grounds: a house party. Use your 'Mind-Goggles' to find the perfect match for your clients preferences. Then seal the deal with your 'Love-Rifle'. The better the matches, the better your paycheck! And Remember: Love knows no gender.

Team:
Katharina Stratmann https://fleija.itch.io/
Bastian Braun https://bastib.itch.io/
Erik Sieverding https://eriklez92.itch.io/
Tim Westerhoff https://muzigpuzig.itch.io/

Notice
Start Game in Ultra Quality for optimal experience!
